clients.name: 嵇康
clients.address: 169 Rutledge Street, Konterra, Northern Mariana Islands, 8551
clients.about: 嵇康，字叔夜，魏末谯郡人。竹林贤士，才高性傲，善琴乐、工诗文。崇老庄，倡 “越名教而任自然”，蔑权贵，拒仕司马氏。因吕安事，为钟会构陷，终遭司马昭所杀，《广陵散》绝。其风范才情，千古传颂。

clients.name: 阮籍
clients.about: 字嗣宗，陈留尉氏（今河南开封）人，三国曹魏文学家、思想家曾任步兵校尉，因此也称”阮步兵。“三岁丧父，年少受到曹丕关切，良好教育。三次辞官，正始十年高平陵之变后，转向司马家族。文学成就《大人先生传》《通老论》《达庄论》《通易论》

clients.name: 山涛
clients.about: 字巨源，河内郡怀县（今河南武陟西）人。自小丧父，生活拮据，有较高气节。四十岁入仕，任河内郡主簿，一路高升历任郎中、从事郎中、尚书吏部郎等官。能够急流勇退，归隐又复出。有殊勋，不自居表现谦谦君子之风。

clients.name: 大卫陈
clients.address: Beij Haidian district, Xueyuan Road, No. 37 415-B 110-R
clients.about: I am a freelancer and amateur  OSS(open source software) application user; And commit myself to provide scheme which depends on lowcost Open source  software/hardware realize;

clients.name: 歌德
clients.address: Beij Haidian district, Xueyuan Road, No. 37 415-B 110-R
clients.about: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, a renowned German writer. Born in 1749, he created masterpieces like 《Faust》 His works explore love, morality, and human nature. A man of diverse interests, his influence on literature is profound. His writings remain timeless, captivating readers worldwide.

clients.name: 冯.诺依曼
clients.address: Beij Haidian district, Xueyuan Road, No. 37 415-B 110-R
clients.about: John von Neumann was a brilliant mathematician and scientist. Born in 1903. He made significant contributions to computer science and game theory. His ideas laid the foundation for modern computing. His work had a profound impact on various fields and remains highly influential to this day.

clients.name: 黄道婆
clients.address: Beij Haidian district, Xueyuan Road, No. 37 415-B 110-R
clients.about: Huangdaopo was a remarkable figure in the Song Dynasty. She learned advanced cotton textile skills in Hainan and brought them back to her hometown. Her innovations, like improved spinning and weaving tools, revolutionized the local textile industry, making a profound and lasting impact on textile development.
